Summary: apeared to have 2 or 3 lights, none flashing, triangular shaped. middle light showed trail
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Eaton
There were no other sightings in Eaton on or around November 1st 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling in my vehicle on US 127 north about 12:45 am coming home from work, as I looked out of the passenger window to glance at the stars on the clear night I saw what at first was a star, then seen that the object had 3 lights in the shape of a triangle, the light in the back of the 3 lights gave off a small trail. The object was high, but larger than the stars in the sky and there were no cellular phone towers in the area. I proceeded up the road and turned around and went back to observe the lights and it was no longer in sight. I felt really anxious as well as scared to see this, it was not normal and I had realized it at the time, I had thought about contacting 911 but did not. I lost sight of the object when i traveled yup the road and turned back around to observe it.
